TEXT.TITLE: ZAYRE <ZY> MARCH SALES UP 12.7 PCT
TEXT.BODY: Zayre Corp said sales for the five weeks ended April Four were up 12.7 pct to 522.3 mln dlrs from 463.5 mln dlrs a year before. The company said sales for the first nine weeks of its fiscal year were up 17.4 pct to 849.3 mln dlrs from 723.7 mln dlrs a year before. Reuter
